page.title: 14VISIT TO GATE FARM
page.content: On Friday we went to Gate Farm and walked round and asked the farmer,Mr Harvey,a few questions.Here are the answers.He had 100 acres and grows Barley,Oats and Grass.The cottage is from 400 to 500 years old.For animal stock he has cows and calves.They are mostly Friesians.He has 40.The cows are milked by machines.They produce 600 to 700 litres and it takes one and a quarter hours to milk.The cows are milked when they are 2.The farmer does forage harvesting.The workers on the farm are his family.He has some old and some new machines and 3 tractors.We had a look at one of the men milking the cows.He showed us what happened to the milk when it had been milked.He had a hay barn,a straw barn, a corn store and a work shop.Also he had a lot of other interesting things.
